## IOC variable

Global IOC container instance. Singleton pattern implementation to ensure only one container instance exists. Throws error if multiple versions of koatty\_container are detected.

  {<!-- -->Container<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
IOC: IContainer
```
